metadata.title: Assemblée des trois ordres de la province de Dauphiné.

Louis XVI, King of France, 1754-1793

metadata.description: By Jean Joseph Mounier. Cf. Martin & Walter, Maignien
"Du vingt-un juillet mil sept cent quatre-vingt-huit ..."--P. [1]
Variant of Martin & Walter. Révolution française, III, 25369; IV:2, 4968
Variant of Saricks, A. Melvin Coll., II, 5298
Variant of Maignien, E. Ouvrages anonymes et pseudonymes du Dauphiné, 236
"Très-respecteuses representations des trois ordres de la province de Dauphiné"--P. 13-23
Summarizes the results of the Assemblée de Vizille, held 21 July 1788, including the letter to the king protesting recent edicts and calling upon him to convene the États-généraux
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title page and cover are combined. Damaged, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text.
